message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for this product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make at least $11,500 to make this worthwhile.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still not able to go above $10,000 for this product. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between our prices?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,250 is still a bit too low for me.  Considering the value of the product and my willingness to negotiate, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000.  This is a fair price that reflects both of our needs.
